import { InfoOutlined, PlayArrow } from "@material-ui/icons"; import "./featured.scss"; function Featured({type}) { return (
{type && (
{type === "movie" ? "Movies" : "Series"}
)}
Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. A tenetur amet excepturi veniam aliquid, molestiae iure quas suscipit, totam facere laborum architecto nam earum repudiandae voluptates delectus vitae rem reprehenderit.
) } export default Featured
